examples.description: is expected to validate that :title cannot be empty/falsy
examples.full_description: Post validations is expected to validate that :title cannot be empty/falsy

exception.message:
Expected Post to validate that :title cannot be empty/falsy, but this
could not be proved.
  After setting :title to ‹""›, the matcher expected the Post to be
  invalid, but it was valid instead.

Expected Post to validate that :category is either ‹"Fiction"› or
‹"Non-Fiction"›, but this could not be proved.
  After setting :category to ‹"shoulda-matchers test string"›, the
  matcher expected the Post to be invalid, but it was valid instead.

examples.full_description: Authors POST /authors with valid author params creates a new author
Authors POST /authors with valid author params returns the author data
Authors POST /authors with valid author params returns a status code of 201 (created)

examples.description: does not create a new author
